title: Tape Intervention R Script
text:
Food waste distribution
The distribution of food waste in the sample is as follows:
As the histograms below show, food waste is very right skewed with many 0s. The distribution is better after log transformation.


Show R script
ggplot(tall, aes(x = fw_g)) +
  geom_histogram(binwidth = 20)+
  labs(title = "Histogram of food waste (g)")





Show R script
ggplot(tall, aes(x = fw_g_log)) +
  geom_histogram(binwidth = .2)  +
  labs(title = "Histogram of log transformed food waste")

title: Tape Intervention R Script
section: Habit of checking which food is near expiry
text:
Habit of checking which food is near expiry


Show R script
lme_stockhs <- lme(hs_stock ~ condition*time, random = ~1|id, data = tall3)
flextable(tidy(lme_stockhs)) %>% colformat_double(digits = 2)



effectgrouptermestimatestd.errordfstatisticp.valuefixed(Intercept)5.380.25151.0021.940.00fixedconditionintervention-0.930.3461.00-2.690.01fixedtimepost-0.280.23151.00-1.230.22fixedtimefollow-up0.150.23151.000.650.51fixedtimefinal0.200.25151.000.790.43fixedconditionintervention:timepost0.690.32151.002.140.03fixedconditionintervention:timefollow-up0.510.34151.001.530.13fixedconditionintervention:timefinal0.550.36151.001.540.13ran_parsidsd_(Intercept)1.04ran_parsResidualsd_Observation0.89


Show R script
emmeans_stockhs <- emmeans(lme_stockhs, specs = ~ condition | time)
contrasts_stockhs <- contrast(emmeans_stockhs, method = "pairwise", adjust = "tukey")
contrasts_time_stockhs <- contrast(emmeans_stockhs, method = "pairwise", by = "condition")
flextable(tidy(contrasts_time_stockhs)) %>% colformat_double(digits = 3)



conditiontermcontrastnull.valueestimatestd.errordfstatisticadj.p.valuecontroltimepre - post0.0000.2800.228151.0001.2280.610controltimepre - (follow-up)0.000-0.1510.231151.000-0.6530.914controltimepre - final0.000-0.2010.254151.000-0.7940.857controltimepost - (follow-up)0.000-0.4310.233151.000-1.8460.256controltimepost - final0.000-0.4810.255151.000-1.8900.237controltime(follow-up) - final0.000-0.0500.256151.000-0.1970.997interventiontimepre - post0.000-0.4130.231151.000-1.7900.282interventiontimepre - (follow-up)0.000-0.6620.243151.000-2.7240.036interventiontimepre - final0.000-0.7540.254151.000-2.9690.018interventiontimepost - (follow-up)0.000-0.2490.245151.000-1.0160.740interventiontimepost - final0.000-0.3410.256151.000-1.3320.544interventiontime(follow-up) - final0.000-0.0920.263151.000-0.3490.985


Show R script
flextable(tidy(contrasts_stockhs)) %>% colformat_double(digits = 3)



timetermcontrastnull.valueestimatestd.errordfstatisticp.valuepreconditioncontrol - intervention0.0000.9260.34461.0002.6920.009postconditioncontrol - intervention0.0000.2330.35161.0000.6630.510follow-upconditioncontrol - intervention0.0000.4140.36161.0001.1470.256finalconditioncontrol - intervention0.0000.3730.38361.0000.9730.335


Show R script
emmeans_stock_df <- as.data.frame(emmeans_stockhs)

ggplot(emmeans_stock_df, aes(x = time, y = emmean, color = condition, group = condition)) +
  geom_point(size = 3) +
  geom_line(size = 1) +
  geom_errorbar(aes(ymin = emmean - SE, ymax = emmean + SE), width = 0.2) +
  labs(title = "Estimated Marginal Means of habit strength of stock checking by Condition and Time",
       x = "Time",
       y = "Habit strength",
       color = "Condition") +
  theme_minimal()

title: Tape Intervention R Script
section: Habit of letting housemates know they can eat food which is near expired
text:
Habit of letting housemates know they can eat food which is near expired


Show R script
lme_sharehs <- lme(hs_share ~ condition*time, random = ~1|id, data = tall3)
flextable(tidy(lme_sharehs)) %>% colformat_double(digits = 2)

title: Tape Intervention R Script
section: Habit of using near expired foods when preparing meals
text:
Habit of using near expired foods when preparing meals


Show R script
lme_mealhs <- lme(hs_meal ~ condition*time, random = ~1|id, data = tall3)
flextable(tidy(lme_mealhs)) %>% colformat_double(digits = 2)

title: Tape Intervention R Script
section: Habit of picking something which is near expired as a snack
text:
Habit of picking something which is near expired as a snack


Show R script
lme_snackhs <- lme(hs_snack ~ condition*time, random = ~1|id, data = tall3)
flextable(tidy(lme_snackhs)) %>% colformat_double(digits = 2)



effectgrouptermestimatestd.errordfstatisticp.valuefixed(Intercept)5.190.23151.0022.220.00fixedconditionintervention-0.650.3361.00-1.970.05fixedtimepost-0.150.23151.00-0.620.53fixedtimefollow-up-0.220.24151.00-0.930.36fixedtimefinal-0.020.26151.00-0.090.93fixedconditionintervention:timepost0.110.33151.000.340.74fixedconditionintervention:timefollow-up0.610.34151.001.780.08fixedconditionintervention:timefinal0.580.37151.001.590.11ran_parsidsd_(Intercept)0.93ran_parsResidualsd_Observation0.91

contrasts_snackhs <- contrast(emmeans_snackhs, method = "pairwise", adjust = "tukey")

flextable(tidy(contrasts_time_snackhs)) %>% colformat_double(digits = 3)
